com.appboy.ui.inappmessage

Interface IInAppMessageViewFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppboyFullViewFactory, AppboyHtmlFullViewFactory, AppboyModalViewFactory, AppboySlideupViewFactory

    public interface IInAppMessageViewFactory

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      android.view.View createInAppMessageView(android.app.Activity activity, IInAppMessage inAppMessage)
      This method should either inflate or programmatically create a new View that will be used to display an in-app message.

    • Method Detail

      • createInAppMessageView

        android.view.View createInAppMessageView(android.app.Activity activity,
                                       IInAppMessage inAppMessage)
        This method should either inflate or programmatically create a new View that will be used to display an in-app message. A new View must be created on every call to createInAppMessageView. This prevents the memory leak that would occur if the View was shared by multiple Activity classes. Note: Do not add click/touch listeners directly to the view. They will be ignored. Instead, use an IInAppMessageManagerListener to perform custom logic.
        Parameters:
        activity -
        inAppMessage -
        Returns:
        View that will be used to display the in-app message.
